changeSet.sql:
create table operation ( id bigserial primary key, name varchar(255) not null, type varchar(255) not null, status varchar(255) not null, error text, started_at timestamp not null, ended_at timestamp, description text,
created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) );

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table completion ( id bigserial primary key, input text not null, output text, input_tokens integer, output_tokens integer, model varchar(255), temperature real, top_p real, status varchar(255) not null, duration_millis bigint, error text,
created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) );

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table transcription ( id bigserial primary key, status varchar(255) not null, cloud_uri varchar(1024), language varchar(255) not null, name varchar(1024) not null, transcript text, application_user_id bigint references application_user (id) not null, completion_id bigint references completion (id), length_millis bigint, download_duration_millis bigint, process_duration_millis bigint, transcribe_duration_millis bigint, transcribe_progress integer, error text,
created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) );

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table settings ( id bigserial primary key, key varchar(255) not null unique, name varchar(255) not null, value jsonb not null,
created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) ); create index settings_key_index on settings (key);

changeSet.author: emiliano
changeSet.sql:
create table template ( id bigserial primary key, name varchar(255) not null unique, content text not null,
created_at timestamp, created_by varchar(255), updated_at timestamp, updated_by varchar(255) );
